title: Dolby Atmos coming to podcasts with Wondery as first supported platform
content:
Earlier this year, Dolby had invited podcasters to prepare their shows for a more immersive experience with Dolby Atmos. Now Dolby has announced that Wondery is the first podcast platform to deliver audio content using Atmos technology.

moreâ€¦

The post Dolby Atmos coming to podcasts with Wondery as first supported platform appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Dolby has announced that Wondery is the first podcast platform to deliver audio content using Dolby Atmos technology.
